sentence: Usually, that signals a potential upset for the incumbent.? The poll also weighed the primary field for the Senate race, which is poised to become an expensive battleground general election contest between incumbent Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-GA) and the leading Republican candidate, Herschel Walker.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Kemp Holds Lead over Perdue in Governor's Race; Herschel Walker Dominates Senate Primary
